languages.text: "Да! Другие звереют и начинают бросаться на близких... А еще..." {n}Мальчишка понижает голос.{/n} "Говорят, в некоторых поселениях... ну... совсем перестали соблюдать законы. И имперские, и... и обычные, человеческие. Люди буквально в зверей превращаются!"

traits.locale_text: "Да! Другие звереют и начинают бросаться на близких... А еще..." {n}Мальчишка понижает голос.{/n} "Говорят, в некоторых поселениях... ну... совсем перестали соблюдать законы. И имперские, и... и обычные, человеческие. Люди буквально в зверей превращаются!"

languages.text: "Yes! Others are going feral and attacking their loved ones... And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are turning into animals."
languages.original_text: "Да! Другие звереют и начинают бросаться на близких... А еще..." {n}Мальчишка понижает голос.{/n} "Говорят, в некоторых поселениях... ну... совсем перестали соблюдать законы. И имперские, и... и обычные, человеческие. Люди буквально в зверей превращаются!"

traits.locale_text: "Yes! Others are going feral and attacking their loved ones... And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are literally turning into animals."

And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are literally turning into animals."

And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. "Yes! Others are going feral and attacking their loved ones... And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are turning into animals."

languages.text: 「そうです！凶暴になって、愛した人を襲う人も…。それから…」{n}少年は声を落とす。{/n}「一部の開拓地で歩調を合わせて…その…あんな法律に従うのはやめたんです。帝国法と、それから…あの…基本的な人間の品格に関する法律に。文字通り、住民は動物に変えられてるんです」
languages.original_text: "Yes! Others are going feral and attacking their loved ones... And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are turning into animals."

traits.locale_text: 「そうです！凶暴になって、愛した人を襲う人も…。それから…」{n}少年は声を落とす。{/n}「一部の開拓地で歩調を合わせて…その…あんな法律に従うのはやめたんです。帝国法と、それから…あの…基本的な人間の品格に関する法律に。文字通り、住民は動物に変えられてるんです」

languages.text: “没错！还有的人发了疯，开始袭击他们的亲人……还有……” {n}男孩压低了声音。{/n}“人们说，在某些定居点……这么说吧……那些人已经不再遵守法律了。无论是帝国的法律，还是……还是……还是最基本的人伦，所有人都变成了野兽。”
languages.original_text: "Yes! Others are going feral and attacking their loved ones... And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are turning into animals."

traits.locale_text: “没错！还有的人发了疯，开始袭击他们的亲人……还有……” {n}男孩压低了声音。{/n}“人们说，在某些定居点……这么说吧……那些人已经不再遵守法律了。无论是帝国的法律，还是……还是……还是最基本的人伦，所有人都变成了野兽。”

languages.text: «¡Así es! La gente pierde la cabeza y se pone a atacar a sus seres queridos... Y luego está...». {n}El muchacho baja la voz.{/n} «La gente dice que en algunos asentamientos... bueno... han dejado de defender la ley directamente. La ley imperial y... y... la de la decencia básica. La gente se convierte en bestias».
languages.original_text: "Yes! Others are going feral and attacking their loved ones... And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are turning into animals."

traits.locale_text: «¡Así es! La gente pierde la cabeza y se pone a atacar a sus seres queridos... Y luego está...». {n}El muchacho baja la voz.{/n} «La gente dice que en algunos asentamientos... bueno... han dejado de defender la ley directamente. La ley imperial y... y... la de la decencia básica. La gente se convierte en bestias».

languages.text: "Ja! Andere drehen durch und attackieren geliebte Menschen ... Und dann ist da noch ..." {n}Der Junge spricht leiser.{/n} "Es heißt, in einigen Ansiedlungen ... nun ... da gibt es überhaupt kein Gesetz mehr. Weder das imperiale Gesetz ... noch das ... das Gesetz des simplen menschlichen Anstands. Die Menschen verwandeln sich in Tiere."
languages.original_text: "Yes! Others are going feral and attacking their loved ones... And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are turning into animals."

traits.locale_text: "Ja! Andere drehen durch und attackieren geliebte Menschen ... Und dann ist da noch ..." {n}Der Junge spricht leiser.{/n} "Es heißt, in einigen Ansiedlungen ... nun ... da gibt es überhaupt kein Gesetz mehr. Weder das imperiale Gesetz ... noch das ... das Gesetz des simplen menschlichen Anstands. Die Menschen verwandeln sich in Tiere."

languages.text: « Oui ! D'autres deviennent sauvages et s'en prennent à leurs proches. Et puis... il paraît que dans certaines colonies, ils ont arrêté de faire respecter la loi, {n}continue le garçon en baissant la voix.{/n} La loi impériale, mais aussi... les lois fondamentales de la décence humaine. Les gens sont en train de se changer en animaux. »
languages.original_text: "Yes! Others are going feral and attacking their loved ones... And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are turning into animals."

traits.locale_text: « Oui ! D'autres deviennent sauvages et s'en prennent à leurs proches. Et puis... il paraît que dans certaines colonies, ils ont arrêté de faire respecter la loi, {n}continue le garçon en baissant la voix.{/n} La loi impériale, mais aussi... les lois fondamentales de la décence humaine. Les gens sont en train de se changer en animaux. »

languages.text: "Evet! Vahşileşip sevdiklerine saldıranlar da var. Sonra bir de..." {n}Çocuk sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Bazı yerleşim yerlerinde kurallara uymayı tamamen bırakmışlar, öyle diyorlar. İmparatorluk kurallarını, hatta temel insani kuralları da. İnsanlar hayvana dönüşüyor."
languages.original_text: "Yes! Others are going feral and attacking their loved ones... And then there's..." {n}The boy lowers his voice.{/n} "People say that in some settlements... well... they've stopped upholding the law altogether. Imperial law, and... and... the law of basic, human decency. People are turning into animals."

traits.locale_text: "Evet! Vahşileşip sevdiklerine saldıranlar da var. Sonra bir de..." {n}Çocuk sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Bazı yerleşim yerlerinde kurallara uymayı tamamen bırakmışlar, öyle diyorlar. İmparatorluk kurallarını, hatta temel insani kuralları da. İnsanlar hayvana dönüşüyor."
